formal_name:
Animal Crossing™: Happy Home
Designer Update Ver. 2.0
description: This is an update for the Animal Crossing™: Happy Home Designer game. This download does not contain the full version of the title. In order to use this update, you must have the full version of Animal Crossing™: Happy Home Designer.
name:
Animal Crossing™: Happy Home
Designer Update Ver. 2.0
disclaimer:
You may need to upgrade your current SD Card to a compatible SDHC Card or microSDHC Card with enough available space to download this software.
Visit support.nintendo.com for information about storage options. Sold separately.
